title: Lucayablennius zingaro
text: Lucayablennius zingaro, the arrow blenny, is a species of <a href="Chaenopsidae">chaenopsid blenny</a> found in <a href="coral%20reef">coral reef</a>s around the <a href="Bahamas">Bahamas</a> and the <a href="Caribbean">Caribbean</a>, in the western central <a href="Atlantic%20ocean">Atlantic ocean</a>. It can reach a maximum length of <a href="fish%20measurement">TL</a>. This species is the only known member of its <a href="genus">genus</a>.
